title: Privacy Policy
introduce: This Privacy Policy applies to all related service of PARK.ONE. PARK.ONE respects and will protect the privacy of all users of the PARK.ONE platform. In order to provide you with more accurate and personalized services, PARK.ONE will use and disclose your personal information in accordance to this privacy policy. Except as otherwise stated in this privacy policy, PARK.ONE will not disclose or provide any information to third party sources without prior consent from the user or as required by law. By using any part of the PARK.ONE platform, you have agreed to the contents of this privacy policy.

item1.title: Ⅰ.Applying Range
item1.describe1: When you register or activate an account on the PARK.ONE platform, you must provide the personal information of the individual registering on the PARK.ONE platform, enterprise name, and other relevant business registration information as required by law. When you use PARK.ONE platform services, PARK.ONE automatically receives and records information received from your browser and computer, including but not limited to your IP address, browser type, use of language, access date and time, software and hardware features, and other data. This information may be directly obtained by PARK.ONE or through third party services.

item2.title: Ⅱ.Use of Information
item2.describe1: Without prior consent, PARK.ONE will not provide, sell, lease, share or trade your personal information to any third party sources. If you are engaged to any services provided by third party companies and/or PARK.ONE affiliated companies, they will be denied access to your information, unless required by law.
item2.describe2: PARK.ONE does not allow the collection, editing, or selling of your personal information in any way. PARK.ONE has the right to terminate the service of any users found engaging in the above activities mentioned.

item3.title: Ⅲ.Use of Information
item3.describe1: Under the following circumstances, PARK.ONE will disclose your personal information in full or in part:
item3.describe2: With your prior consent, PARK.ONE may disclose your personal information to a third party;
item3.describe3: You are required to disclose your details if you are found to be in violation of laws of your jurisdiction, regulations or PARK.ONE service agreements or related rules;
item3.describe4: Your personal information will be disclosed to third party sources to provide you with products and service information as per requested;
item3.describe5: PARK.ONE reserves the right to decide to provide any necessary information or contact information to facilitate the completion of a transaction or dispute resolution during a transaction created on the PARK.ONE platform.

item4.title: Ⅳ.The Storage and Exchange of Information
item4.describe1: Any information collected by PARK.ONE or PARK.ONE affiliated companies will be stored on its servers. These data may be transmitted without respect to jurisdiction to any servers operated by PARK.ONE.

item5.title: Ⅴ.The Use of Cookies
item5.describe1: PARK.ONE platform uses cookies to provide you with a more personalized service, including promotional services. You have the right to accept or reject cookies. You can choose to accept cookies by modifying your browser settings. In the event that you refuse to accept cookies, you may not be able to log in or use PARK.ONE platform services or any functions that rely on cookies.

item6.title: Ⅵ. Information Security
item6.describe1: Your account has a security feature to protect your account and password information. PARK.ONE has security measures in place to ensure that your information is not lost, abused, or altered. Despite the aforementioned security measures, please take note that there are no “perfect” security measures in the information network.
item6.describe2: Special attention to minors, if you are not a natural person with full civil rights and full civil capacity, you have no right to use  PARK.ONE service. Therefore, PARK.ONE wants you not to provide your personal information to us.
